DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to Evaluate the Optimal Dosage of Mosapride (Medirac) and Probitics in Irritable Bowel Syndrome Without Predominant Diarrhea.
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Clinical Study to Evaluate the Optimal Dosage of Mosapride and Probiotics in Irritable Bowel Syndrome Without Predominant Diarrhea
DOC.criteria: Aged 1875 years who satisfied RomeIII criteria for the diagnosis of IBS Signed informed consent IBSD evidence of cathartic colon or history laxative abuse
DOC.keyword: irritable bowel syndrome without predominant diarrhea
